name: Risotto and Meatballs
instructions: Combine water and broth concentrate in a medium pot, bring to boil over medium heat
While water comes to a boil, cube squash, toss with 2 tbsp oil, salt, and pepper and place on a parchment lined baking sheet
Roast squash on top rack for 20-22 minutes
Combine beef breadcrumbs, and italian seasoning in large bowl. Roll mixture into 16 equal-sized balls
Bake meatballs on another parchment-lined baking sheet on a middle rack until golden brown and cooked 74˚C/165˚F, 8-10 minutes
Meanwhile, heat butter in a pan over medium heat, add onions and some salt until onions are softened, 2-3 minutes
Add rice and garlic, cook until fragrant, 1-2 minutes; stir often
Add 1 cup of broth to pot with rice, stir until all broth has been absorbed
Continue adding broth 1 cup at a time until liquid is absorbed and texture is creamy, 28-30 minutes; stir often
When the last bit of broth is absorbed and the rice is tender/creamy, reduce heat to low
Add spinach and half of the cheese until spinach wilts, 3-4 minutes
Serve risotto and top with meatballs and remaining cheese
